title: Inventory API
description: IQM's advanced algorithm deterines the most relevant ads to display to a user based on their activity and the content of a given page. Inventories provide advertisers a way to organize collecions or groups based on criteria such as ad format, placement type, targeting options, and other attributes. Private Marketplace (PMP) deals and Programmatic Guarantee (PG) deals are arranged so advertisers can purchase ad inventory. This page will cover common methods and endpoints associated with Inventories, PMP Deals, PG Deals, and Groups.
